sentences.sentence: Note the cheilosis at the corners of the mouth from riboflavin deficiency as a result of the malabsorbtion.
sentences.translation: 可见核黄素缺乏其嘴角出现唇干裂，此为对核黄素吸收障碍所致。

sentences.sentence: Other studies have found that up to 60% of the riboflavin is lost under similar conditions.
sentences.translation: 其他研究也指出，在同样的条件下，60%的核黄素会损失掉。
